message:
Assalamu'alaikum :) 
How much it cost to develop an android app? 7ad ya2dr yfedni?
shokran moqdman!

data.message:
it depends on a lot of factors
1- features
2- complex of UI
3- time it take to completion
every app has its unique situation
over all if you are going to sell your time as freelancer make sure that you are satisfied because it need discipline
I think you just need the android developers tools and a $25 fee for publishing the app on Google play

Amr Ahmed Elghadban app with login system and accounts manager and ability to add news connected with website db ,complicated ui look like windows 8 ui ,time to take it to completion more than 100 hours with all of this features also include making a panel for controlling all of this stuff online
Khaled Mhd I know about that ,i want to know how much it cost to make the app
Khaled Mhd what is the range for making it ?

http://www.freelancer.com/ 
Take a look here and see similar projects

100 hours is this your estimation or the client deadline . there is an important factor time "every client wish that you finish the app yesterday"
if you estimate this job with this, and your work rate every day is about 4 hours will take about 25 days.
there is 2 ways to estimate price in this case i usually follow this technique
1- average for app like this min 5 K and it depends on client /brand you are going to develop for
2- per your hour rate prise ... exp: if 15 $ /hour it will be 15 x 100= 1500$
Amr Ahmed Elghadban it's sounds great 3amtan :D .. shokran :)
Mohamed Ghonemi   you are welcome any time , don't be hesitate if you need any help just send me a msg :)
